                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * WRITES A RECORD TO THE GSAM OUTPUT FILE.
       6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD.
           CALL "CBLTDLI" USING SL-FUNC-ISRT
                                VINCENT-PCB
                                WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
           MOVE VINCENT-PCB-STATUS
             TO SC-IMS-STAT
           IF  SC-IMS-STAT-OK
               ADD +1
                TO WS-NBR-OUTPUT-RECS-WRITTEN
           ELSE
               MOVE VINCENT-PCB-STATUS
                 TO IMS-ABEND-STATUS
               MOVE SL-FUNC-ISRT
                 TO IMS-ABEND-FUNCTION
               MOVE VINCENT-PCB-NAME
                 TO IMS-ABEND-PCB-NAME
               MOVE IMS-ABEND-MSG
                 TO ABEND-MSG
               MOVE "6000C"
                 TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
               PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-IF
           .
      * THIS PARAGRAPH WILL WRITE ALL THE AUDIT INFORMATION OUT TO THE
      * AUDIT REPORT.
       6020C-WRITE-AUDIT-DETAIL.
           MOVE SPACES
             TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE ALL "="
             TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE SPACES
             TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW001 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW001
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM SALE-CHK :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-SALE-CHK
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW003 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW003
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW004 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW004
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW007 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW007
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW008 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW008
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW027 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW027
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW031 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW031
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW032 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW032
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW033 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW033
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW034 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW034
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW035 :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW035
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL SYSPARM RECORDS READ   :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-SYSPARM-RECS-READ
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL MEXW027 ROWS NOT FOUND :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-MEXW027-NOTFOUND-CALLS
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL MEXW035 ROWS NOT FOUND :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-MEXW035-NOTFOUND-CALLS
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "TTL OUTPUT RECORDS WRITTEN :"
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE WS-NBR-OUTPUT-RECS-WRITTEN
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           .
      * OBTAINS THE CURRENT DEARBORN TIMESTAMP, PART OF WHICH WILL BE
      * USED IN THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR AND THE E & G HEADER/TRAILER
      * ALONG WITH THE VINCENT HEADER.
       7000C-OBTAIN-DRBN-TIMESTAMP.
           EXEC SQL
              SET  :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP  = CURRENT TIMESTAMP
           END-EXEC
           MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    CONTINUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SQLCODE
                      TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "SELECT"
                      TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
                      TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
                      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7000C"
                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * UPDATE THE TIMESTAMP ON THE MEXS016 TABLE WITH THE TIME THAT
      * THE JOB STARTED.  THIS VALUE WILL BE READ IN THE NEXT TIME THIS
      * PROGRAM IS EXECUTED.
       7250C-UPDATE-TIMESTAMP.
            MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
              TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
            MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
              TO GNT-TABLE-ID
            MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-TIMESTAMP
              TO GNT-KEY-DATA
            EXEC SQL
                UPDATE MEXS016_GENERIC2
                SET    GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA = :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
                WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD      = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
                AND    GNT_TABLE_ID       = :GNT-TABLE-ID
                AND    GNT_KEY_DATA       = :GNT-KEY-DATA
            END-EXEC
            MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    CONTINUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SQLCODE
                      TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "UPDATE"
                      TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
                      TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
                      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7250C"
                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * SELECT THE PREVIOUS RUN'S OUTPUT FILE BATCH NUMBER.
       7300C-GET-BATCH-NBR.
            MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
              TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
            MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
              TO GNT-TABLE-ID
            MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-BATCHCTL
              TO GNT-KEY-DATA
           EXEC SQL
               SELECT GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA
               INTO  :GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
               FROM   MEXS016_GENERIC2
               WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
               AND    GNT_TABLE_ID  = :GNT-TABLE-ID
               AND    GNT_KEY_DATA  = :GNT-KEY-DATA
           END-EXEC
           MOVE SQLCODE
                     TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    SET BATCHCTL-FOUND
                     TO TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-INVALID-DATE
                    SET BATCHCTL-NOT-FOUND
                     TO TRUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SQLCODE
                      TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "SELECT"
                      TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
                      TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
                      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7300C"
                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * UPDATE THE OUTPUT FILE'S BATCH NUMBER BY +1.
       7350C-UPDATE-BATCH-NBR.
            MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
              TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
            MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
              TO GNT-TABLE-ID
            MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-BATCHCTL
              TO GNT-KEY-DATA
            MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
              TO GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
            EXEC SQL
                UPDATE MEXS016_GENERIC2
                SET    GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA = :GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
                WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD      = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
                AND    GNT_TABLE_ID       = :GNT-TABLE-ID
                AND    GNT_KEY_DATA       = :GNT-KEY-DATA
            END-EXEC
            MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    CONTINUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SQLCODE
                      TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "UPDATE"
                      TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
                      TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
                      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7350C"
                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * POPULATES THE HUB HEADER TO THE OUTPUT FILE.
       7400C-POPULATE-HUB-HEADER.
            MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
              TO HUB-HDR-LAYOUT-ID
            MOVE WS-ENTITY-CD
              TO HUB-HDR-ENTITY-CODE
            MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
              TO HUB-HDR-LAYOUT-ID
            MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
              TO HUB-HDR-TIMESTAMP
            MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
              TO HUB-HDR-BATCH-NBR
            MOVE WS-PROCESS-ID
              TO HUB-HDR-PROCESS-ID
            MOVE ZERO
              TO HUB-HDR-TOTAL-REC-CNT
            MOVE SPACES
              TO HUB-HDR-PRIMARY-CONTACT
                 HUB-HDR-SECOND-CONTACT
           MOVE HUB-HEADER
             TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
            .
      * POPULATES THE HUB TRAILER IN THE OUTPUT FILE.
       7450C-POPULATE-HUB-TRAILER.
            MOVE WS-ENTITY-CD
              TO HUB-TRL-ENTITY-CODE
            MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
              TO HUB-TRL-LAYOUT-ID
            MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
              TO HUB-TRL-TIMESTAMP
            MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
              TO HUB-TRL-BATCH-NBR
            MOVE WS-PROCESS-ID
              TO HUB-TRL-PROCESS-ID
            MOVE WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
              TO HUB-TRL-TOTAL-REC-CNT
            MOVE SPACES
              TO HUB-TRL-PRIMARY-CONTACT
                 HUB-TRL-SECOND-CONTACT
           MOVE HUB-TRAILER
             TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
            .
      * POPULATES THE VINCENT HEADER IN THE OUTPUT FILE.
       7500C-POPULATE-VINCENT-HEADER.
            INITIALIZE VNT-HDR-HUB-REC-ID-NBR
            MOVE 1
              TO VNT-HDR-HUB-LINE-NBR
                 VNT-HDR-REC-ID-NBR
                 WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
            STRING
                WS-DRBN-YEAR
                WS-DRBN-MONTH
                WS-DRBN-DAY
                DELIMITED BY SIZE
              INTO
                VNT-HDR-CURR-DATE
            END-STRING
            STRING
                WS-DRBN-HOUR
                WS-DRBN-MINUTE
                WS-DRBN-SECOND
                DELIMITED BY SIZE
              INTO
                VNT-HDR-CURR-TIME
            END-STRING
            MOVE LIT-WDMSALEM
              TO VNT-HDR-REC-TYPE
            MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
              TO VNT-HDR-CURR-BATCH-NBR
            MOVE WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
              TO VNT-HDR-PREV-BATCH-NBR
            MOVE LOW-VALUES
              TO VNT-HDR-LOW-VALUES
            MOVE VINCENT-HEADER
              TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
            .
      * POPULATES THE VINCENT TRAILER IN THE OUTPUT FILE.
       7550C-POPULATE-VINCENT-TRAILER.
            INITIALIZE VNT-TRL-HUB-REC-ID-NBR
            ADD  1
              TO WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
            MOVE WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
              TO VNT-TRL-HUB-LINE-NBR
                 VNT-TRL-REC-ID-NBR
            MOVE LIT-999
              TO VNT-TRL-HUB-REC-TYPE
            MOVE LIT-WDMSALEM
              TO VNT-TRL-REC-TYPE
            MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
              TO VNT-TRL-CURR-BATCH-NBR
            MOVE WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
              TO VNT-TRL-COUNTER
            MOVE VINCENT-TRAILER
              TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
            .
      * SELECTS WERS STRING FROM MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING DB2 TABLE
       7600C-SELECT-WERS-DATA-W004.
           EXEC SQL
               SELECT  VWR_WERS_STRING_X
                      ,VWR_WERS_VL_C
                      ,VWR_WERS_PRD_TP_C
                      ,VWR_MAJ_FEAT_DFNED_F
                 INTO :VWR-WERS-STRING-X
                     ,:VWR-WERS-VL-C
                     ,:VWR-WERS-PRD-TP-C
                     ,:VWR-MAJ-FEAT-DFNED-F
                 FROM  MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING
                WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C     =  :VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C
                  AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C   =  :VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
           END-EXEC
           MOVE SQLCODE                     TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    IF VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT    > SPACES    AND
                       VWR-MAJ-FEAT-DFNED-F      = LIT-Y
                       SET WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW     TO TRUE
                       ADD +1                       TO
                                            WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW004
                    END-IF
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
                    SET WERS-STRING-NOT-FOUND-SW
                                            TO TRUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    PERFORM 7620C-WRITE-MEXW004-AUDIT-RPT
                    MOVE SC-DB2-SQLCODE     TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "SELECT"           TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-MEXW004    TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7600C"            TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      /*****************************************************************
      * WRITE AUDIT REPORT FOR MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING TABLE           *
       7620C-WRITE-MEXW004-AUDIT-RPT.
           MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE " VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C: "      TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C           TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE " VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C: "    TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C         TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
           .
      * SELECT CURRENT STATUS FROM MEXW003_VEH_STATUS                  *
       7700C-SELECT-CURR-STAT-W003.
           EXEC SQL
               SELECT  STA_STATUS_C
                    ,  VST_STAT_Y
                 INTO :VST-STA-STATUS-C
                    , :VST-STAT-Y
                 FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS
                WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C     =  :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
                  AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C   =  :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
                  AND  VST_CUR_STAT_F   =  :LIT-Y
                  AND  VST_ACTIVE_F     =  :LIT-Y
           END-EXEC
           MOVE SQLCODE                     TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
                    SET CURR-STAT-FOUND-SW  TO TRUE
               WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
                    SET CURR-STAT-NOT-FOUND-SW
                                            TO TRUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SC-DB2-SQLCODE     TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
                    MOVE "SELECT"           TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
                    MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "7700C"            TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    STRING "ABEND: 7700C-SELECT-CURR-STAT-W003 "
                    DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
                    END-STRING
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    STRING "VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C  : ", VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
                    DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
                    END-STRING
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    STRING "VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C: ", VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
                    DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
                    END-STRING
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    STRING "VST-CURR-STAT-F   : ", LIT-Y
                    DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
                    END-STRING
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    STRING "VST-ACTIVE-F      : ", LIT-Y
                    DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
                    END-STRING
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
                    WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * READS THE INPUT SYSPARM FILE TO OBTAIN THE PRODUCTION SOURCE.
       8000C-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD.
           CALL "CBLTDLI" USING SL-FUNC-GN
                                SYSPARM-PCB
                                SYSPARM-RECORD
           MOVE SYSPARM-PCB-STATUS
             TO SC-IMS-STAT
           EVALUATE TRUE
               WHEN SC-IMS-STAT-OK
                    ADD +1
                     TO WS-NBR-SYSPARM-RECS-READ
                    SET NOT-END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
                     TO TRUE
               WHEN SC-IMS-STAT-END-OF-DB
                    SET END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
                     TO TRUE
               WHEN OTHER
                    MOVE SYSPARM-PCB-STATUS
                      TO IMS-ABEND-STATUS
                    MOVE SL-FUNC-GN
                      TO IMS-ABEND-FUNCTION
                    MOVE SYSPARM-PCB-NAME
                      TO IMS-ABEND-PCB-NAME
                    MOVE IMS-ABEND-MSG
                      TO ABEND-MSG
                    MOVE "8000C"
                      TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
                    PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
           END-EVALUATE
           .
      * IF A CALL TO TABLE MEXW035 RESULTED IN A SQL +100 (NOT FOUND)
      * CONDITION, THE INFORMATION WILL BE WRITTEN OUT TO THE AUDIT
      * REPORT AND RETURN-CODE WILL BE SET TO 3, SO THAT AN EMAIL
      * MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE GEVIS HELPDESK TO INFORM THEM TO
      * LOOK AT THE AUDIT REPORT.
       9000C-MISSING-MEXW035-ROW.
           MOVE SPACES
             TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "MISSING DEALER ON MEXW035:  "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "DEALER CODE:         "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE DLR-DLR-DLR-C
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           ADD 1
            TO WS-NBR-MEXW035-NOTFOUND-CALLS
           .
      * IF A CALL TO TABLE MEXW027 RESULTED IN A SQL +100 (NOT FOUND)
      * CONDITION, THE INFORMATION WILL BE WRITTEN OUT TO THE AUDIT
      * REPORT AND RETURN-CODE WILL BE SET TO 3, SO THAT AN EMAIL
      * MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE GEVIS HELPDESK TO INFORM THEM TO
      * LOOK AT THE AUDIT REPORT.
       9100C-MISSING-MEXW027-ROW.
           MOVE SPACES
             TO AUDIT-RECORD
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "MISSING STATUS ON MEXW027:  "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE PL-SPACE
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "STATUS CODE:         "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE CNT-GBL-DATA-X
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "
             TO AUDIT-LABEL
           MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C
             TO AUDIT-DATA
           WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
           SET SEND-EMAIL
            TO TRUE
           ADD 1
            TO WS-NBR-MEXW027-NOTFOUND-CALLS
           .
      * CALLS COREDUMP TO FORCE AN ABEND CAUSED BY AN ERROR.
       9999C-CALL-COREDUMP.
           CALL "COREDUMP"
           .
       COPY CPESEBCR.
      *BMPSHELL CALLED ROUTINES

identification_division.syntax:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID.    EXWWB910.
DATE-WRITTEN.  JULY 2006.
DATE-COMPILED.
* PROGRAM DESCRIPTION
* EXWWB910 IS A BATCH PROGRAM THAT IS DESIGNED TO EXTRACT VEHICLE
* DATA, CUSTOMER DATA AND DEALER DATA FROM VARIOUS DB2 TABLES
* WHICH ARE OWNED AND MAINTAINED BY GEVIS AND TO CREATE AN
* OUTBOUND BRIDGE FILE WHICH WILL BE USED BY VINCENT (NORTH
* AMERICAN INCENTIVE CLAIMING SYSTEM) TO RE-REVIEW ALL VRULES
* PROGRAMS AND COMPARE TO ALL VIN RECORDS.  VINCENT WILL REVIEW
* CHARGEBACK (AUTOMATIC POST CLAIM VALIDATION) ) AND AUTO CLAIM
* GENERATION WHEN THE BUSINESS REQUESTS A "FULL PASS" IN VRULES.
* PROGRAM PROCESSSING:
* THE PROGRAM WILL READ IN AN INPUT SYSPARM FILE WHICH WILL
* CONTAIN A LIST OF PRODUCERS TO BE PROCESSED.  IT WILL PROCESS
* ONE PRODUCER AT A TIME.  WHEN A PRODUCER IS FIRST READ IN, A
* DB2 CURSOR WILL BE OPENED WHICH DRIVES OFF OF TABLE MEXW001_
* VEH_ORDER AND SELECTS ROWS WHERE THE MODEL YEARS ARE 1 YEAR
* BACK AND 2 YEARS FORWARD.  ONLY ROWS THAT ARE ASSOCIATED WITH
* A CURRENT WDMO DEALER WILL BE FURTHER  PROCESSED AND OUTPUT
* TO THE OUTBOUND BRIDGE FILE.  THE BRIDGE FILE WILL CONTAIN
* STANDARD E & G HEADERS/TRAILERS ALONG WITH VINCENT HEADERS/
* TRAILERS.
* NOTE:  THERE MAY BE INSTANCES WHERE SOME FIELDS EXTRACTED
* FROM THE GEVIS DB2 TABLES, MAY NOT BE POPULATED WITH DATA.
* IN THAT CASE, IF THE FIELD IS ALPHANUMERIC, SPACES WILL BE
* CONTAINED WITHIN THE CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELD AND IF THE
* FIELD IS NUMERIC, ZEROS WILL BE CONTAINED WITHIN THE COR-
* CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELD.
*                       REVISION LOG
* DATE     PROGRAMMER REVISION
* -------- ---------- -------------------------------------------
* 07/25/06 SRYDZEW1   ORIGINAL PROGRAM CREATION
* 11/21/06 SRYDZEW1   MODIFED PROGRAM TO SEND A VINCENT STATUS
*                     CODE OF 600 INSTEAD OF 800 WHEN THERE ARE
*                     NO SALES TYPE OR SALES DATE AVAILABLE.
*                     ALSO, THE GLOBAL ORDERING DEALER AND
*                     CURRENT GLOBAL STOCKING DEALER WILL BE
*                     POPULATED WITH A SUPER DEALER CODE, IF
*                     ONE EXISTS.  IF THERE IS NO CORRESPONDING
*                     SUPER DEALER CODE, THEN SPACES WILL BE
*                     MOVED.
* 05/01/07 SRYDZEW1   MODIFIED PROGRAM TO CALL NEW SUBROUTINE
*                     EXWWSSTK WHICH WILL BE USED TO OBTAIN THE
*                     CURRENT STOCKING DEALER, CURRENT STOCKING
*                     DEALER STATUS CODE AND CURRENT STOCKING
*                     DEALER STATUS DATE.  PREVIOUSLY, THAT DATA
*                     WAS OBTAINED INTERNALLY BY A CALL TO TABLE
*                     MEXW003.  NOTE:  IF A CALL TO EXWWSSTK
*                     RESULTS IN A SQL +100, THEN AN EMAIL
*                     MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE HELP DESK
*                     TO LET THEM KNOW TO CHECK THE AUDIT REPORT
*                     WHICH WILL CONTAIN THE ORDER-ID AND SOURCE
*                     OF THE VEHICLES NOT FOUND.
*                     E-TRACKER 1090765
* 07/18/07 SRYDZEW1   MODIFIED PROGRAM TO RETURN THE CURRENT
*                     STATUS CODE RATHER THAN THE CURRENT STOCKING
*                     DEALER'S STATUS CODE.  NOTE: THE CURRENT
*                     STOCKING DEALER AND CURRENT DEALER ARE THE
*                     SAME AS FAR AS VINCENT IS CONCERNED AND THAT
*                     WILL NOT BE CHANGING.
*                     E-TRACKER 5333232
* 07/23/07 EGOSSEL2   MODIFIED PROGRAM TO RETURN THE CURRENT
*                     STATUS DATE RATHER THAN THE CURRENT STOCKING
*                     DEALER'S STATUS DATE.
* 04/29/08 SRYDZEW1   MODIFIED PROGRAM WITH THE FOLLOWING CHANGES
* WHICH WERE REQUESTED BY THE VINCENT/GEVIS BUSINESS TEAM:
* 1) THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR WILL RETRIEVE ROWS WHICH ARE NOW 2
*    MODEL YEARS BACK, INSTEAD OF 1 MODEL YEAR BACK.
* 2) ALL VEHICLES WHICH HAVE BEEN REPORTED AS SOLD IN THE PAST
*    YEAR AND THAT ARE OLDER THAN 2 MODEL YEARS FROM THE CURRENT
*    RUN TIME YEAR WILL BE RETRIEVED.
* ETRACKER 6726596
* 06/27/08 SRYDZEW1   MODIFIED PROGRAM TO BACK OUT THE CHANGE FROM
* #1 ABOVE WHICH RETRIEVES ROWS THAT ARE 2 MODEL YEARS BACK.  WE
* WILL REVERT BACK TO GOING ONLY 1 MODEL YEAR BACK.  THIS CHANGE
* WILL REQUIRE A CHANGE TO #2 ABOVE.  THE CHANGE WILL BE TO PULL
* VEHICLES THAT HAVE BEEN REPORTED AS SOLD IN THE PAST YEAR AND
* ARE OLDER THAN 1 MODEL YEAR, INSTEAD OF 2 MODEL YEARS.  FINALLY,
* A NEW CHANGE WILL BE IMPLEMENTED WHICH RETRIEVES BODY STYLE
* INFORMATION FROM TABLE MEXW031_CATMAP FOR NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA'
* SOURCES.  ALSO, THE GEVIS VEHICLE LINE WILL BE RETRIEVED FOR
* ALL SOURCES EXCEPT 'NA' AND 'EA' USING THE WERS VEHICLE LINE
* FROM THE CATALOG CODE AND SELECTING THE GEVIS VEHICLE LINE
* FROM TABLE MEXW034.
* THE FORE MENTIONED CHANGES ARE STILL PART OF ETRACKER 6726596.
* 07/13/09 TALFIERI   MODIFIED PROGRAM TO PROCESS DEMO SALES.
*                     ON A SALE SENT FROM GOALS, IF CUSTOMER TYPE
*                     IS "A4" (FOR DEALERSHIP USE), SEND A STATUS
*                     CODE OF "801" TO VINCENT.
* 06/01/11 EDAVIS15   CHANGES MADE TO GET FEATURE DATA FROM THE
*                     WERS STRING ON MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING DB2
*                     TABLE INSTEAD OF THE CATALOG CODE IF THE
*                     WERS STRING EXISTS.
*                     ETRACKER #10169343
* 09/18/12 EDAVIS15   MODIFIED PROGRAM MEXW001_CSR CURSOR TO
*                     INCLUDE AN 'ORDER BY' DB2 STATEMENT TO
*                     IMPROVE PROFORMANCE AND REDUCE CPU USAGE.
*                     ETRACKER #11419683
* 03/18/13 EDAVIS15   CHANGE PROGRAM TO REMOVE THE CALL TO
*                     SUBROUTINE EXWWSWER, IT IS USE TO FORMAT THE
*                     WERS STRING PROCESS
*                     ETRACKER: 11838861
* DATE    : 05/20/2013  PROGRAMMER: DAWN MAHN
* ETRACKER: 11108662
* REASON  : IF STATUS ROW IS NOT FOUND ON MEXW027 FOR SOURCE VI,
*           THE JOB WILL END WITH CC3 AND AN EMAIL WILL BE SENT
*           TO THE GEVIS HELP DESK.  THE TRANSACTION WILL NOT BE
*           WRITTEN TO THE OUTPUT FILE.
* DATE    : 05/20/2013  PROGRAMMER: ESTES DAVIS
* ETRACKER: 12551789
* REASON  : MODIFIED PROGRAM TO INCLUDE CHECKPOINT PROCESS AFTER
*           WRITING TO VINCENT OUTPUT FILE. THIS SHOULD
*           IMPROVE PROFORMANCE AND PREVENT LOCKING OF OTHER
*           GEVIS JOBS. ALSO, INCLUDE 'WITH HOLD' AND 'FOR READ
*           ONLY' FOR ALL CURSORS.
* DATE    : 05/19/2014  PROGRAMMER: ESTES DAVIS
* ETRACKER: 12661154
* REASON  : CODE CHANGES WERE INCLUDED TO INCREASE PERFORMANCE,
*           IF THIS DOESN'T HELP, ALL CODE ADDED SHOULD BE
*           REMOVED.
*           ADD 'WITH UR' DB2 OPTION TO ALL SELECT,
*           SELECT INTO AND FETCH (DECLARE) SQL STATEMENTS.
*           THIS IS ADDED FOR PERFORMANCE ISSUES.
* DATE    : 06/18/2014  PROGRAMMER: ESTES DAVIS
* ETRACKER: 12736949
* REASON  : REMOVED ALL 'WITH UR' DB2 OPTION FROM ALL CURSORS
*           AND SQL CALLS. UNFORTUNATELY THIS DID NOT IMPROVE
*           PRODUCTION RUN TIME.
* DATE    : 02/17/2015  PROGRAMMER: MARK FALLOT
* ETRACKER: 12480445
* REASON  : CHANGE VINCENT SALES MINI EXTRACT TO GET THE
*           WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER CODE FROM FTC QAD.
* DATE    : 11/12/2015  PROGRAMMER: ESTES DAVIS
* ETRACKER: 13835620
* REASON  : CHANGED TO INCLUDE WERS PRODUCT TYPE TO
*           MEXW034_VEH_BRAND TABLE.
*           (5114C-SELECT-MEXW034-GEVIS-VL PARAGRAPH)
*           THE PRODUCT TYPE WAS SELECTED FROM
*           MEXW032_CATALOG TABLE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS.
*           (5112C-SELECT-MEXW032-WERS-VL PARAGRAPH)
* DATE    : 02/08/2018  PROGRAMMER: DAWN MAHN
* ETRACKER: 15334234
* REASON  : CHANGE THE MODEL YEAR CRITERIA IN THE CURSORS
*           FROM -1 TO -4.
*           CURSORS CHANGED: MEXW001_CSR AND SALE_CHK_CSR
* DATE    : 07/30/2018  PROGRAMMER: DAWN MAHN
* ETRACKER: 15525041
* REASON  : REMOVE ALL REFERENCES TO STORED PROCEDURE EXWWSSTK
*           TO IMPROVE PROCESSING TIME.

* MAIN DRIVING CURSOR TO SELECT ROWS FROM TABLE MEXW001 WHICH ARE
* 4 MODEL YEARS BACK AND 2 MODEL YEARS FORWARD FROM THE CURRENT
* YEAR.
* NOTE: THE DATA SOURCE IS POPULATED FROM THE INPUT SYSPARM FILE.
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  MEXW001_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,VEH_ORD_ID_C
,DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,WMI_WMI_C
,VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,VEH_CATALOG_C
,VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,VEH_PO_Y
,VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,VEH.COUNTRY_ISO3_C
,VEH.DLR_DLR_C
,DLR.DLR_SUPER_DLR_C
FROM  MEXW001_VEH_ORDER VEH
,  MEXW035_DLR_MSTR  DLR
WHERE  VEH.DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  VEH.VEH_ORD_ID_C      > :WS-ORDER-ID-BLANK
AND BDT_MDL_YR_Y BETWEEN :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY +2
AND VEH_ACTIVE_F       = :VEH-ACTIVE-F
AND VEH_VIN_FULL_C     > :WS-VEH-VIN-BLANK
AND VEH.DLR_DLR_C      = DLR.DLR_DLR_C
AND DIV_DIV_C          = :LIT-EX
AND SUB_SUBLVL1_C      = :LIT-WDM
ORDER BY VEH_ORD_ID_C
, DTA_DATA_SRC_C
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
* THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO JOIN THE MEXW001 AND MEXW008 TABLES
* WHERE THE VEHICLE WAS SOLD WITHIN THE PAST 12 MONTHS AND THE
* MODEL YEAR IS OLDER THAN 4 YEARS.
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  SALE_CHK_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  VEH.VEH_VIN_FULL_C
,VEH.VEH_ORD_ID_C
,VEH.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
,VEH.BDT_MDL_YR_Y
,VEH.WMI_WMI_C
,VEH.VEH_LCL_PLT_C
,VEH.VEH_LCL_BDYTYP_C
,VEH.VEH_GBL_ORD_DLR_C
,VEH.VEH_GBL_SHIP_TO_C
,VEH.VEH_ORD_RCPT_Y
,VEH.VEH_WDMO_FLEET_C
,VEH.VEH_WDMO_ORD_TYP
,VEH.VEH_CATALOG_C
,VEH.VEH_GBL_CATALOG_C
,VEH.VEH_PO_Y
,VEH.VEH_GEVIS_VL_C
,VEH.COUNTRY_ISO3_C
,VEH.DLR_DLR_C
,DLR.DLR_SUPER_DLR_C
FROM  MEXW001_VEH_ORDER VEH
,MEXW008_VEH_RTL   VRS
,MEXW035_DLR_MSTR  DLR
WHERE  VRS.DTA_DATA_SRC_C = :VRS-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  VRS.VRS_UPDT_S     > :WS-CURR-DRBN-TMSTMP-LESS-1
AND  VRS.VRS_ACTIVE_F   = :VRS-ACTIVE-F
AND  VEH.BDT_MDL_YR_Y   < :WS-CURR-MODEL-YY -4
AND  VEH.VEH_VIN_FULL_C > :WS-VEH-VIN-BLANK
AND  VEH.VEH_ORD_ID_C   = VRS.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND  VEH.DTA_DATA_SRC_C = VRS.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND  VEH.DLR_DLR_C      = DLR.DLR_DLR_C
AND  DIV_DIV_C          = :LIT-EX
AND  SUB_SUBLVL1_C      = :LIT-WDM
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
* THIS CURSOR WILL BE USED TO SELECT ONE ROW FROM TABLE MEXW031
* FOR NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA' DATA SOURCES.  THE RETRIEVED VALUES
* WILL BE USED IN PLACE OF THE LOCAL BODY STYLE CODE THAT WAS
* OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW001.
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  MEXW031_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  OPT_OPTION_C
,VPT_PROD_TYP_C
FROM  MEXW031_CATMAP
WHERE  DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :CTM-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  CTM_LCL_CATALOG_C = :CTM-LCL-CATALOG-C
AND  OFM_OPTION_FAM_C IN ("BS", "CA")
OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC
* THIS CURSOR IS BEING USED IN ORDER TO RETRIEVE THE MOST RECENT
* WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER FROM TABLE MEXW003 USING A "40V" STATUS
* CODE AND THE FTC QAD CURRENT DATA SOURCE (WD).
EXEC SQL
DECLARE  MEXW003_40V_CSR CURSOR WITH HOLD FOR
SELECT  VST_GBL_LOC_C
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS
WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C       = :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C     = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  STA_STATUS_C       = :VST-STA-STATUS-C
AND  VST_ACTIVE_F       = :VST-ACTIVE-F
AND  VST_STAT_TYP_C     = :VST-STAT-TYP-C
AND  VST_CUR_DATA_SRC_C = :VST-CUR-DATA-SRC-C
ORDER BY  VST_STAT_Y  DESC
,VST_STATIC_ISRT_REC_S  DESC
FOR READ ONLY
END-EXEC

*              P R O C E D U R E   D I V I S I O N               *

procedure_division.syntax: *                        M A I N L I N E                         *

0000P-MAINLINE.
ENTRY "DLITCBL" USING IO-PCB
SYSPARM-PCB
VINCENT-PCB
PERFORM 0100I-INITIALIZATION
PERFORM 1000P-PROCESS UNTIL END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
PERFORM 0200I-CONCLUSION
IF SEND-EMAIL
MOVE 3 TO RETURN-CODE
END-IF
GOBACK
.
COPY CPESEBIC.
*BMPSHELL INITIALIZATION AND CONCLUSION
* INITIALIZE THE CHECKPOINT SAVE AREA                            *

0300P-INITIALIZE-SAVE-AREA.
CONTINUE
* DO NOT INITIALIZE THE CHECKPOINT AREA SINCE THERE ARE VALUES
* HARDCODED IN THERE
.
* INITIALIZE THE REPORT TITLES                                   *

0350P-INITIALIZE-REPORT-TITLES.
CONTINUE
.
* PROGRAM SPECIFIC INITIALIZATION                                *

0400P-INITIALIZE-OTHER.
SET NOT-END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
TO TRUE
INITIALIZE  WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
WS-SWITCHES
WS-VARIABLES
PERFORM 7000C-OBTAIN-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
MOVE WS-DRBN-YEAR
TO WS-CURR-MODEL-YY
PERFORM 7300C-GET-BATCH-NBR
MOVE GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA (1:5)
TO WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
IF WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR = 99999
MOVE 0
TO WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
END-IF
COMPUTE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR = WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR + 1
PERFORM 8000C-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD
IF END-OF-SYSPARM-FILE
MOVE "MISSING SYSPARM RECORDS"
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "PARAGRAPH 0400P"
TO  ABEND-MSG-2
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-IF
PERFORM 7400C-POPULATE-HUB-HEADER
PERFORM 6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD
PERFORM 7500C-POPULATE-VINCENT-HEADER
PERFORM 6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD
MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
TO WS-CURR-DRBN-TMSTMP-LESS-1
SUBTRACT 1 FROM WS-DRBN-YEAR-LESS-1
.
* PROGRAM SPECIFIC CONCLUSION                                    *

0700P-CONCLUDE-OTHER.
PERFORM 7250C-UPDATE-TIMESTAMP
PERFORM 7350C-UPDATE-BATCH-NBR
PERFORM 7550C-POPULATE-VINCENT-TRAILER
PERFORM 6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD
PERFORM 7450C-POPULATE-HUB-TRAILER
PERFORM 6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD
PERFORM 6020C-WRITE-AUDIT-DETAIL
.
* MAIN DRIVING PARAGRAPH CALLED FROM 0000P-MAINLINE.  A LOOP WILL
* BE PERFORMED WHICH WILL PROCESS ALL VEHICLES FOR A PRODUCTION
* SOURCE.  AT THE END OF THE LOOP, THE NEXT PRODUCTION SOURCE
* WILL BE READ IN.

1000P-PROCESS.
PERFORM 2010C-OPEN-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 2020C-FETCH-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 2000C-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE
UNTIL MEXW001-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 2030C-CLOSE-MEXW001-CSR
PERFORM 2100C-OPEN-SALE-CHK-CSR
PERFORM 2120C-FETCH-SALE-CHK-CSR
PERFORM 2040C-PROCESS-SALE-CHK-CSR
UNTIL SALE-CHK-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 2140C-CLOSE-SALE-CHK-CSR
PERFORM 8000C-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD
.

2000C-PROCESS-GEVIS-VEHICLE.
* THE FIRST STEP WILL BE TO DETERMINE WHETHER OR NOT THE
* VEHICLE'S CURRENT STOCKING DEALER IS WDMO BASED. IF IT IS,
* THEN FURTHER PROCESSING WILL CONTINUE.  IF IT IS NOT, THEN THE
* VEHICLE WILL BE SKIPPED AND THEN NEXT ONE WILL BE SELECTED.
* THIS PARAGRAPH WILL BE PERFORMED UNTIL THERE ARE NO MORE VEH-
* ICLES FOR A PRODCUTION SOURCE.
* NOTE: INITIALIZATION WILL OCCUR PRIOR TO THE PROCESSING OF THE
* NEXT VEHICLE.
PERFORM 5000C-PROCESS-GEVIS-DETAIL-REC
PERFORM 2020C-FETCH-MEXW001-CSR
.

2010C-OPEN-MEXW001-CSR.
* OPENS THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR WHICH WILL PULL ROWS FROM TABLE
* MEXW001 THAT ARE 1 MODEL YEAR BACK AND 2 MODEL YEARS FORWARD
* FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
MOVE SYSPARM-DATA-SRC
TO VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VEH-ACTIVE-F
EXEC SQL
OPEN MEXW001_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
IF  NOT SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "OPEN"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-ORDER
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2010C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-IF
.

2020C-FETCH-MEXW001-CSR.
* FETCHES A ROW FROM THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR WHICH WILL PULL ROWS
* FROM TABLE MEXW001 THAT ARE 1 MODEL YEAR BACK AND 2 MODEL
* YEARS FORWARD FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
EXEC SQL
FETCH  MEXW001_CSR
INTO
:VEH-VIN-FULL-C
,:VEH-ORD-ID-C
,:VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
,:VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
,:VEH-WMI-WMI-C
,:VEH-LCL-PLT-C
,:VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C
,:VEH-GBL-ORD-DLR-C
,:VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C
,:VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y
,:VEH-WDMO-FLEET-C
,:VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP
,:VEH-CATALOG-C
,:VEH-GBL-CATALOG-C
,:VEH-PO-Y
,:VEH-GEVIS-VL-C
,:VEH-COUNTRY-ISO3-C
,:VEH-DLR-DLR-C
,:DLR-SUPER-DLR-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW001
SET MEXW001-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-END-OF-CURSOR
SET MEXW001-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "FETCH"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-ORDER
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2020C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.

2030C-CLOSE-MEXW001-CSR.
* CLOSES THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR WHICH PULLS ROWS FROM TABLE
* MEXW001 THAT ARE 1 MODEL YEAR BACK AND 2 MODEL YEARS FORWARD
* FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
EXEC SQL
CLOSE MEXW001_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
IF  NOT SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "CLOSE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-ORDER
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2030C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-IF
.

2040C-PROCESS-SALE-CHK-CSR.
* THIS PARAGRAPH IS USED TO PROCESS ROWS SELECTED FROM THE
* SALE_CHK_CSR WHICH CONTAINS VEHICLES THAT HAVE BEEN REPORTED
* AS SOLD WITHIN THE PAST 12 MONTHS AND THAT ARE OLDER THAN 1
* MODEL YEAR FROM THE CURRENT YEAR. FIRST, WE WILL VERIFY IF
* THE DEALER IS WDMO BASED AND IF IT IS, WE WILL THEN MOVE ALL
* DATA FOR THE VEHICLE TO THE OUTPUT RECORD.  AFTERWARDS, THE
* NEXT ROW WILL BE SELECTED FROM THE SALE_CHK_CSR.
PERFORM 5000C-PROCESS-GEVIS-DETAIL-REC
PERFORM 2120C-FETCH-SALE-CHK-CSR
.

2100C-OPEN-SALE-CHK-CSR.
* OPENS THE SALES CHECK CURSOR WHICH RETRIEVES ALL SALES THAT
* HAVE OCCURRED IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS THAT HAVE A MODEL YEAR THAT
* IS OLDER THAN 1 YEAR FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
MOVE SYSPARM-DATA-SRC
TO VRS-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VRS-ACTIVE-F
EXEC SQL
OPEN SALE_CHK_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
IF  NOT SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "OPEN"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-SALE-CHK-CSR
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2100C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-IF
.

2120C-FETCH-SALE-CHK-CSR.
* FETCHES A ROW FROM THE SALES CHECK CURSOR WHICH RETRIEVES ALL
* SALES THAT HAVE OCCURRED IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS THAT HAVE A
* MODEL YEAR THAT IS OLDER THAN 1 YEAR FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
EXEC SQL
FETCH  SALE_CHK_CSR
INTO
:VEH-VIN-FULL-C
,:VEH-ORD-ID-C
,:VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
,:VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
,:VEH-WMI-WMI-C
,:VEH-LCL-PLT-C
,:VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C
,:VEH-GBL-ORD-DLR-C
,:VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C
,:VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y
,:VEH-WDMO-FLEET-C
,:VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP
,:VEH-CATALOG-C
,:VEH-GBL-CATALOG-C
,:VEH-PO-Y
,:VEH-GEVIS-VL-C
,:VEH-COUNTRY-ISO3-C
,:VEH-DLR-DLR-C
,:DLR-SUPER-DLR-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-SALE-CHK
SET SALE-CHK-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-END-OF-CURSOR
SET SALE-CHK-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "FETCH"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-SALE-CHK-CSR
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2120C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.

2140C-CLOSE-SALE-CHK-CSR.
* CLOSES THE SALES CHECK CURSOR WHICH RETRIEVES ALL SALES THAT
* HAVE OCCURRED IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS THAT HAVE A MODEL YEAR THAT
* IS OLDER THAN 1 YEAR FROM THE CURRENT YEAR.
EXEC SQL
CLOSE SALE_CHK_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
IF  NOT SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "CLOSE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-SALE-CHK-CSR
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "2140C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-IF
.
* AT THIS POINT, THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN IDENTIFED AS HAVING A
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER THAT IS CLASSIFIED AS WDMO.  NOW, OTHER
* DATA WILL BE GATHERED FOR THE VEHICLE AND THEN MOVED AND
* WRITTEN TO THE OUTPUT FILE.

5000C-PROCESS-GEVIS-DETAIL-REC.
SET WERS-STRING-NOT-FOUND-SW     TO TRUE
INITIALIZE                          MEXW004-VEH-WERS-STRING
VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C          TO VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C                TO VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C
PERFORM 7600C-SELECT-WERS-DATA-W004
MOVE LIT-E
TO WS-DTL-VEH-DIVISION-C
PERFORM 5020C-MOVE-MEXW001-TO-DTL
PERFORM 5060C-OBTAIN-RETAIL-DATA
PERFORM 5040C-MOVE-CURR-STOCK-TO-DTL
PERFORM 5080C-OBTAIN-WHOLESALE-DATA
PERFORM 5100C-OBTAIN-WERS-DATA
PERFORM 5120C-OBTAIN-MEXW003-20T
IF MEXW003-FOUND-20T
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-SCHD-VST-TARGET-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
PERFORM 5140C-OBTAIN-MEXW003-30R
IF MEXW003-FOUND-30R
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-PRODUCE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
ELSE
PERFORM 5160C-OBTAIN-MEXW003-30P
IF MEXW003-FOUND-30P
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-PRODUCE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
END-IF
PERFORM 5180C-OBTAIN-MEXW003-30T
IF MEXW003-FOUND-30T
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-RELEASE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
PERFORM 5200C-OBTAIN-MEXW003-80F
IF MEXW003-FOUND-80F
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-ARRIVAL-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
PERFORM 5220C-OPEN-40V-CSR
PERFORM 5230C-FETCH-40V-ROW
IF MEXW003-40V-CSR-ROW-FOUND
MOVE VST-GBL-LOC-C
TO WS-DTL-LAST-QAD-VST-GBL-LOC-C
END-IF
PERFORM 5240C-CLOSE-40V-CSR
IF   WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR  = 999999
MOVE ZERO
TO WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
END-IF
IF   WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR = 999999
MOVE ZERO
TO WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
END-IF
IF MEXW027-FOUND
INITIALIZE WS-DTL-HUB-REC-ID-NBR
ADD  +1
TO  WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
MOVE WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
TO WS-DTL-REC-ID-NBR
WS-DTL-HUB-LINE-NBR
MOVE LIT-001
TO WS-DTL-HUB-REC-SEQ-NBR
MOVE LIT-010
TO WS-DTL-HUB-REC-TYPE
MOVE WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
PERFORM 6000C-WRITE-VINCENT-RECORD
PERFORM 9400I-INCREMENT-CHKP-COUNT
END-IF
INITIALIZE  WS-VINCENT-DETAIL-RECORD
.
* DATA THAT WAS PREVIOUSLY FETCHED FROM TABLE MEXW001 WILL NOW
* BE MOVED TO THE OUTPUT RECORD.
* E-TRACKER 6726596 CHANGE:  THE BODY STYLE INFORMATION WILL BE
* RETRIEVED FROM TABLE MEXW031_CATMAP FOR NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA'
* SOURCES.
* NOTE: IF THE NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA' SOURCES ARE NOT FOUND ON
* TABLE MEXW031, THEN WE WILL MOVE THE VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C WHICH
* WAS RETRIEVED FROM TABLE MEXW001.
* THE MEXW031-CSR WHEN EXECUTED, BRINGS BACK ONE ROW.
* BODY STYLE - VWR-WERS-STRING-TEXT(10:2) IS THE WERS OPTION
*              CODE FOR BODY STYLE FROM TABLE MEXW004
* WHEN MEXW031-CSR IS EXECUTED, IT ONLY BRINGS BACK ONE ROW
* FOR PROCESSING.

5020C-MOVE-MEXW001-TO-DTL.
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C
TO WS-DTL-VIN-FULL-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
TO WS-DTL-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
TO WS-VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
MOVE WS-VEH-BDT-MDL-YR-YY
TO WS-DTL-BDT-MDL-YR-Y
MOVE VEH-WMI-WMI-C
TO WS-DTL-WMI-WMI-C
MOVE VEH-LCL-PLT-C
TO WS-DTL-LCL-PLT-C
IF  WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
MOVE VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT(10:2)
TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
ELSE
PERFORM 5300C-OPEN-MEXW031-CSR
PERFORM 5320C-FETCH-MEXW031-CSR
PERFORM 5340C-CLOSE-MEXW031-CSR
IF MEXW031-FOUND
MOVE CTM-OPT-OPTION-C
TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
ELSE
MOVE VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C
TO WS-DTL-LCL-BDYTYP-C
END-IF
END-IF
MOVE VEH-GBL-ORD-DLR-C
TO DLR-DLR-DLR-C
PERFORM 5050C-GET-MEXW035-DATA
IF MEXW035-FOUND
IF DLR-SUPER-DLR-C = ZEROS
MOVE SPACES
TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE DLR-SUPER-DLR-C
TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C-REFORMAT
TO WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
END-IF
END-IF
*    ----------------------------------------------------------
*    THE SHIP TO DEALER IS THE DEALER THAT WAS REPORTED AT THE
*    TIME OF THE ORDER, SO IF IT'S EQUAL TO SPACES, WE WILL USE
*    THE ORIGINAL ORDERING DEALER.
*    ----------------------------------------------------------
IF   VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C
> SPACES
MOVE VEH-GBL-SHIP-TO-C
TO WS-DTL-SHIP-TO-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-GBL-DLR-C
TO WS-DTL-SHIP-TO-DLR-C
END-IF
STRING VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (1:4)
VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (6:2)
VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-ORD-RCPT-Y
END-STRING
MOVE VEH-WDMO-FLEET-C
TO WS-DTL-WDMO-FLEET-C
MOVE VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP
TO WS-DTL-VEH-WDMO-ORD-TYP
MOVE VEH-GBL-CATALOG-C
TO WS-DTL-VEH-CATALOG-C
IF VEH-PO-Y > '0001-01-01'
STRING VEH-PO-Y (1:4)
VEH-PO-Y (6:2)
VEH-PO-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-PO-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C
TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
.
* THE CURRENT DEALER/STOCKING DEALER, CURRENT STATUS CODE AND
* CURRENT STATUS CODE DATE WERE RETRIEVED EARLIER.  NOW THE CUR-
* RENT VEHICLE'S STATUS CODE WILL BE USED TO OBTAIN THE VINCENT
* EQUIVALENT FROM TABLE MEXW027 USING "VI" AS THE PRODUCTION
* SOURCE.
* NOTE: DURING DEVELOPMENT OF THIS PROGRAM, IT WAS DECIDED TO
* INSERT GLOBAL/LOCAL CODES ON THE MEXW027 CONVERSION TABLE,
* WITH THE VALUES THAT VINCENT USES FOR THEIR VRULES PROCESSING.
* RATHER THAN HARD CODING THE VALUES IN THIS PROGRAM AND THE
* STORED PROCEDURE (EXWWGEVP), IT IS BETTER TO MAKE A DIRECT CALL
* TO THE TABLE WHERE THE CODES CAN BE MORE EASILY CHANGED, SHOULD
* A CHANGE ARISE IN THE FUTURE.
* A CHECK HAS BEEN ADDED TO SEND VINCENT A STATUS CODE OF 600
* INSTEAD OF 800 WHEN THERE ARE NO SALES TYPE OR SALES DATE
* AVAILABLE.

5040C-MOVE-CURR-STOCK-TO-DTL.
INITIALIZE WS-MEXW027-SW
MOVE VEH-DLR-DLR-C
TO DLR-DLR-DLR-C
PERFORM 5050C-GET-MEXW035-DATA
IF MEXW035-FOUND
IF DLR-SUPER-DLR-C = ZEROS
MOVE SPACES
TO WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C
WS-DTL-CURR-DLR-C
ELSE
MOVE DLR-SUPER-DLR-C
TO WS-DLR-SUPER-DLR-C-REFORMAT
MOVE WS-DLR-SUPER-DLR-C-REFORMAT
TO WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C
WS-DTL-CURR-DLR-C
END-IF
END-IF
PERFORM 7700C-SELECT-CURR-STAT-W003
IF WS-DTL-CURR-STOCKING-DLR-C  >
SPACES
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-STOCK-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
IF CURR-STAT-FOUND-SW
PERFORM 5045C-SELECT-MEXW027-DATA
IF MEXW027-NOT-FOUND
PERFORM 9100C-MISSING-MEXW027-ROW
END-IF
IF MEXW027-FOUND
MOVE CNT-LCL-DATA-X (1:3)
TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
END-IF
END-IF
IF WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C = LIT-800
IF   VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C = "A4"
MOVE LIT-801
TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
ELSE
IF   WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C     = SPACES
OR WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y = SPACES
MOVE LIT-600
TO WS-DTL-CUR-STA-STATUS-C
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
.
* THE VINCENT EQUIVALENT STATUS CODE WILL NOW BE OBTAINED FOR THE
* CURRENT STATUS CODE THAT WAS RETRIEVED.
* SPECIAL NOTE:  WHEN ADDING ROWS TO TABLE MEXW027 FOR VINCENT,
* THE GLOBAL STATUS CODES MUST BE UNIQUE. THE FOLLOWING RULE
* ALSO APPLIES- THERE CAN EXIST ONE LOCAL STATUS CODE THAT CAN
* BE ASSIGNED TO SEVERAL DIFFERENT GLOBAL STATUS CODES (I.E.
* LOCAL CODE = 600 HAS MULTIPLE GLOBAL CODES OF 80J & 90U).

5045C-SELECT-MEXW027-DATA.
MOVE VST-STA-STATUS-C
TO CNT-GBL-DATA-X
MOVE LIT-STATUS
TO CNT-CND-CNV-TYP-C
MOVE LIT-VI
TO CNT-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
EXEC SQL
SELECT  CNT_LCL_DATA_X
INTO
:CNT-LCL-DATA-X
FROM  MEXW027_CONV
WHERE  CND_CNV_TYP_C     = :CNT-CND-CNV-TYP-C
AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :CNT-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  CNT_GBL_DATA_X    = :CNT-GBL-DATA-X
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW027
SET MEXW027-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW027-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-CONV
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5045C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.

5050C-GET-MEXW035-DATA.
* A CALL WILL BE PLACED TO TABLE MEXW035 IN EITHER OF TWO SIT-
* UATIONS.  1) TO OBTAIN THE SUPER DEALER CODE WHICH WILL BE
* USED IN PLACE OF THE GLOBAL ORDERING DEALER CODE AND/OR GLOBAL
* CURRENT STOCKING DEALER CODE.  2)  TO DETERMINE WHETHER OR NOT
* THE CURRENT STOCKING DEALER IS WDMO BASED.
EXEC SQL
SELECT
SUB_SUBLVL1_C
,DLR_SUPER_DLR_C
INTO
:DLR-SUB-SUBLVL1-C
,:DLR-SUPER-DLR-C
FROM  MEXW035_DLR_MSTR
WHERE  DLR_DLR_C           = :DLR-DLR-DLR-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD 1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW035
SET MEXW035-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW035-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
PERFORM 9000C-MISSING-MEXW035-ROW
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-DLR-MSTR
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5050C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* A JOIN WILL BE DONE ON TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW008 TO OBTAIN
* VARIOUS RETAIL DATA (IF THE VEHICLE IS IN RETAIL STATUS).
* NOTE: THE RETAILED STATUS DATE WILL BE USED TO POPULATE THE
* DELIVERY DATE WHICH IS THE SAME.

5060C-OBTAIN-RETAIL-DATA.
PERFORM 5065C-SELECT-MEXW008-90V-DATA
IF MEXW008-FOUND-90V
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-RETAIL-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-RETAIL-VST-STAT-Y
TO WS-DTL-VEH-DELIVER-VST-STAT-Y
PERFORM 5070C-POPULATE-RETAIL-OUTPUT
END-IF
.
* A JOIN WILL BE DONE ON TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW008 TO OBTAIN
* VARIOUS RETAILED DATA (IF THE VEHICLE HAS REACHED RETAIL STATUS)

5065C-SELECT-MEXW008-90V-DATA.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C
TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
TO VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-90V
TO VST-STA-STATUS-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
VST-ACTIVE-F
EXEC SQL
SELECT
A.VST_STAT_Y
,B.VRS_LCL_FLEET_C
,B.VRS_CST_FIRST_N
,B.VRS_CST_BUS_1_N
,B.VRS_CST_BUS_2_N
,B.VRS_CST_MID_INIT_X
,B.VRS_CST_LAST_N
,B.VRS_CST_ADDR_1_X
,B.VRS_CST_ADD_DIV2_N
,B.VRS_CST_ADD_DIV1_C
,B.VRS_CST_POSTAL_C
,B.VRS_SALESPERSON_C
,B.VRS_TYP_LCL_CUST_C
,B.VRS_RPT_SALE_Y
,B.VRS_WARR_STRT_Y
INTO
:VST-STAT-Y
,:VRS-LCL-FLEET-C
,:VRS-CST-FIRST-N
,:VRS-CST-BUS-1-N
,:VRS-CST-BUS-2-N
,:VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X
,:VRS-CST-LAST-N
,:VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X
,:VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N
,:VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C
,:VRS-CST-POSTAL-C
,:VRS-SALESPERSON-C
,:VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
,:VRS-RPT-SALE-Y
,:VRS-WARR-STRT-Y
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS A
,MEXW008_VEH_RTL B
WHERE  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C      = :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C      = :VST-STA-STATUS-C
AND  A.VST_LAST_OCCUR_F  = :VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F      = :VST-ACTIVE-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F      = B.VRS_ACTIVE_F
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C      = B.STA_STATUS_C
AND  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C      = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND  SUBSTR(A.VST_LCL_LOC_C, 1,7)
= B.VRS_LCL_DLR_C
AND  A.VST_STAT_Y        = B.VRS_RETAIL_Y
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW008
SET MEXW008-FOUND-90V
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW008-NOT-FOUND-90V
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-MEXW003-08
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5065C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* IF A 90V STATUS WAS FOUND FOR THE VEHICLE, THEN VARIOUS RETAIL
* SALES DATA WILL BE MOVED TO CORRESPONDING OUTPUT FIELDS.  IF
* THE 90V STATUS WAS NOT FOUND FOR THE VEHICLE, THEN SPACES WILL
* BE MOVED TO THOSE OUTPUT FIELDS.
* PER CUSTOMER, IF CUSTOMER FIRST NAME & LAST NAME IS BLANK, THEN
* THE BUSINESS NAME WILL BE MOVED TO THE FIRST NAME FIELD

5070C-POPULATE-RETAIL-OUTPUT.
MOVE VRS-LCL-FLEET-C
TO WS-DTL-VRS-LCL-FLEET-C
IF    VRS-CST-FIRST-N = SPACES
AND VRS-CST-LAST-N  = SPACES
MOVE VRS-CST-BUS-1-N (1:30)
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-FIRST-N
MOVE VRS-CST-BUS-2-N (1:30)
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-LAST-N
ELSE
MOVE VRS-CST-FIRST-N
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-FIRST-N
MOVE VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-MID-INIT-X
MOVE VRS-CST-LAST-N
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-LAST-N
END-IF
MOVE VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADDR-1-X
MOVE VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADD-DIV2-N
MOVE VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-ADD-DIV1-C
MOVE VRS-CST-POSTAL-C
TO WS-DTL-VRS-CST-POSTAL-C
MOVE VRS-SALESPERSON-C
TO WS-DTL-VRS-SALESPERSON-C
PERFORM 5075C-POPULATE-CONCEPS-SLSTYP
*--- VEHICLE SALES RECEIPT DATE- IF IT EXISTS ( > 0001-01-01)
IF VRS-RPT-SALE-Y > '0001-01-01'
STRING VRS-RPT-SALE-Y (1:4)
VRS-RPT-SALE-Y (6:2)
VRS-RPT-SALE-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
END-IF
*    ----------------------------------------------------------
*    IF VEHICLE WARRANTY START DATE DOES NOT EXIST (0001-01-01)
*    WE WILL USE THE RETAIL SALES DATE, IF THE RETAIL SALES
*    DATE EXISTS (> THAN 0001-01-01).
*    ----------------------------------------------------------
IF   VRS-WARR-STRT-Y > '0001-01-01'
STRING VRS-WARR-STRT-Y (1:4)
VRS-WARR-STRT-Y (6:2)
VRS-WARR-STRT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-WARRANT-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
ELSE
IF VRS-RPT-SALE-Y  > '0001-01-01'
MOVE WS-DTL-VEH-SLSRCPT-VST-STAT-Y
TO WS-DTL-VEH-WARRANT-VST-STAT-Y
END-IF
END-IF
.
* THE GEVIS CUSTOMER TYPE CODE WILL BE CONVERTED TO A CONCEPS
* SALES TYPE CODE.

5075C-POPULATE-CONCEPS-SLSTYP.
EVALUATE VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A1"
WHEN "0 "
MOVE "0"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A2"
WHEN "R "
MOVE "R"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A3"
WHEN "L "
MOVE "L"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A4"
MOVE " "
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "A5"
WHEN "E "
MOVE "E"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F1"
WHEN "7 "
MOVE "7"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F2"
WHEN "3 "
MOVE "3"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F3"
WHEN "T "
MOVE "T"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "F4"
WHEN "4 "
MOVE "4"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "L2"
WHEN "L4"
WHEN "D "
MOVE "D"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
WHEN "L1"
WHEN "L3"
WHEN "6 "
MOVE "6"
TO WS-DTL-VRS-TYP-LCL-CUST-C
END-EVALUATE
.
* TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW007 WILL BE JOINED IN ORDER TO OBTAIN
* VARIOUS WHOLESALE INFORMATION, IF THE VEHICLE HAS REACHED THAT
* STAGE.
* NOTE: THE VEHICLE TOTAL AMOUNT MUST BE IN UNITED STATES DOLLAR
* CURRENCY (USD).  IF IT IS NOT, THEN ZERO WILL BE MOVED TO THE
* FIELD.

5080C-OBTAIN-WHOLESALE-DATA.
PERFORM 5085C-SELECT-MEXW003-40V
IF MEXW003-FOUND-40V
MOVE VST-GBL-LOC-C
TO WS-DTL-CURR-VST-GBL-LOC-C
STRING VST-STAT-Y (1:4)
VST-STAT-Y (6:2)
VST-STAT-Y (9:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-VEH-INVOICE-VST-STAT-Y
END-STRING
IF VWS-CUR-CURRENCY-C = LIT-USD
MOVE VWS-TOT-LCL-A
TO WS-DTL-VWS-TOT-US-A
ELSE
MOVE ZERO
TO WS-DTL-VWS-TOT-US-A
END-IF
END-IF
.
* A JOIN ON TABLES MEXW003 & MEXW007 WILL BE DONE INTO ORDER TO
* RETRIEVE THE CURRENT INVOICE DEALER, THE INVOICING PREPARATION
* DATE, THE CURRENCY CODE AND THE VEHICLE TOTAL AMOUNT.

5085C-SELECT-MEXW003-40V.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C
TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
TO VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-40V
TO VST-STA-STATUS-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
VST-ACTIVE-F
EXEC SQL
SELECT A.VST_GBL_LOC_C
,A.VST_STAT_Y
,B.VWS_TOT_LCL_A
,B.CUR_CURRENCY_C
INTO
:VST-GBL-LOC-C
,:VST-STAT-Y
,:VWS-TOT-LCL-A
,:VWS-CUR-CURRENCY-C
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS A
,MEXW007_VEH_WHS B
WHERE  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C      = :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C      = :VST-STA-STATUS-C
AND  A.VST_LAST_OCCUR_F  = :VST-LAST-OCCUR-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F      = :VST-ACTIVE-F
AND  A.VST_ACTIVE_F      = B.VWS_ACTIVE_F
AND  A.STA_STATUS_C      = B.STA_STATUS_C
AND  A.VEH_ORD_ID_C      = B.VEH_ORD_ID_C
AND  A.DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = B.DTA_DATA_SRC_C
AND  A.VST_STAT_Y        = B.VWS_DATE_Y
AND  SUBSTR(A.VST_LCL_LOC_C, 1,7)
= B.VWS_LCL_DLR_C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW007
SET MEXW003-FOUND-40V
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW003-NOT-FOUND-40V
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-MEXW003-07
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5085C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* THE WERS VEHICLE LINE CODE WILL BE OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW034
* OR FROM TABLE MEXW004_WERS_VL_STRING.
* IF 'EA' OR 'NA' SOURCED, THE WERS VEHICLE LINE IS OBTAINED FROM
* MEXW034 DB2 TABLE USING THE PROD SOURCE AND GEVIS VEHICLE LINE,
* WHICH WAS OBTAINED FROM MEXW001 DB2 TABLE.
* FOR ALL OTHER SOURCES, IF THE ORDER IS FOUND ON MEXW004 DB2
* TABLE, USE THE WERS VEHICLE LINE FROM MEXW004 DB2 TABLE AND
* GEVIS VEHICLE LINE FROM MEXW034 DB2 TABLE WERS PRODUCT TYPE CODE
* AND WERS BODY USE TO MAKE UP THE WERS BODY STYLE.
* IF NOT FOUND ON MEXW004 DB2 TABLE, USE WERS VEHICLE LINE
* FROM MEXW0032 (CATALOG CODE), PRODUCT TYPE AND WERS BODY USE
* TO MAKE UP WERS BODY STYLE.
* IF NOT FOUND ON MEXW004 OR MEXW031/MEXW032 DB2 TABLES, WE ARE
* ASSUMING THE ORDER IS FROM HISTORY FOR 'NA' AND 'EA', USE
* MEXW034 DB2 TABLE PRODUCT TYPE CODE AND BODY TYPE FROM MEXW033
* USE TO MAKE UP THE BODY STYLE.

5100C-OBTAIN-WERS-DATA.
SET MEXW034-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
IF VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C = LIT-EA OR LIT-NA
IF VEH-GEVIS-VL-C  > "  "
PERFORM 5110C-SELECT-W034-DATA
END-IF
IF MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-WERS-VL-C
TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1)
TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
ELSE
IF  WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
PERFORM 5102C-WERS-STRING-PROCESS
ELSE
PERFORM 5112C-SELECT-MEXW032-WERS-VL
IF  MEXW032-FOUND
PERFORM 5104C-CATALOG-CODE-PROCESS
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
MOVE SPACES                      TO WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
IF  WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW
STRING VWR-WERS-PRD-TP-C
, VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT(10:2)
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
ELSE
IF  MEXW031-FOUND
STRING CTM-VPT-PROD-TYP-C
, CTM-OPT-OPTION-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE INTO WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
ELSE
IF  VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C  =  LIT-EA  OR  LIT-NA
PERFORM 5115C-SELECT-MEXW033-DATA
IF  MEXW033-FOUND
IF  BDT-WERS-BDY-TYP-C  >  SPACES
STRING VLN-WERS-PRD-TP-C
, BDT-WERS-BDY-TYP-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO WS-DTL-WERS-BODY-STYLE-C
END-STRING
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
END-IF
.
* PROCESS FEATURE DATA FROM WERS STRING W004 TABLE
* EVALUATE WERS VEHICLE LINE.  THESE ARE HANDLED AS
* EXEPTIONS AS THEY CAN APPEAR MUTIPLE TIMES FOR
* DIFFERENT GEVIS VEHICLE LINES.

5102C-WERS-STRING-PROCESS.
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C               TO WS-WERS-VL-C
IF  WS-VALID-VEH-LINE-CDS
EVALUATE VWR-WERS-VL-C
WHEN "KI"
WHEN "K5"
MOVE "L5"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
WHEN "DB"
MOVE "DB"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
PERFORM 5110C-SELECT-W034-DATA
END-IF
IF  MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-GEVIS-VL-C          TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C           TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1)  TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
ELSE
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C          TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VWR-WERS-VL-C           TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE SPACES                  TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
.
* PROCESS CATALOG CODE
* EVALUATE CATALOG CODE VEHICLE LINE.  THESE ARE HANDLED AS
* EXEPTIONS AS THEY CAN APPEAR MUTIPLE TIMES FOR
* DIFFERENT GEVIS VEHICLE LINES.

5104C-CATALOG-CODE-PROCESS.
MOVE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C          TO WS-WERS-VL-C
IF  WS-VALID-VEH-LINE-CDS
EVALUATE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C
WHEN "KI"
WHEN "K5"
MOVE "L5"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
WHEN "DB"
MOVE "DB"           TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE "AB"           TO VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
SET MEXW034-FOUND   TO TRUE
END-EVALUATE
ELSE
PERFORM 5114C-SELECT-MEXW034-GEVIS-VL
END-IF
IF MEXW034-FOUND
MOVE VLN-GEVIS-VL-C         TO WS-DTL-GEVIS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE CTG-VHL-VEH-LINE-C     TO WS-DTL-WERS-VEH-LINE-C
MOVE VLN-WERS-BRAND-C (2:1) TO WS-DTL-WERS-BRAND-C
END-IF
.
* RETRIEVES THE WERS VEHICLE LINE DATA USING THE GEVIS VEHICLE
* LINE CODE AND PRODUCTION SOURCE.
* NOTE: THIS ONLY APPLIES TO 'NA' AND 'EA' DATA SOURCES.

5110C-SELECT-W034-DATA.
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
TO VLN-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-GEVIS-VL-C
TO VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VLN-ACTIVE-F
EXEC SQL
SELECT   VLN_WERS_VL_C
,VLN_WERS_PRD_TP_C
,VLN_WERS_BRAND_C
INTO
:VLN-WERS-VL-C
,:VLN-WERS-PRD-TP-C
,:VLN-WERS-BRAND-C
FROM  MEXW034_VL_BRAND
WHERE  DTA_DATA_SRC_C    = :VLN-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  VLN_GEVIS_VL_C    = :VLN-GEVIS-VL-C
AND  VLN_ACTIVE_F      = :VLN-ACTIVE-F
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW034
SET MEXW034-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW034-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VL-BRAND
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5110C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.

TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION

TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG

TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH

END-EVALUATE

WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND

TO ABEND-MSG

* BY USING THE DATA OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW001 IN THE WHERE

5115C-SELECT-MEXW033-DATA.

TO BDT-PROD-SRC-C

TO BDT-START-YR-R
BDT-END-YR-R
MOVE VEH-LCL-BDYTYP-C

TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5200C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* AT THIS POINT, A CURSOR WILL BE CREATED USING TABLE MEXW003 TO
* SELECT ALL 40V STATUS CODES WITH AN FTC QAD CURRENT DATA SOURCE
* (WD). THE NEWEST ROW CONTAINS THE WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER CODE
* TO SEND TO VINCENT. AN "ORDER BY VST_STAT_Y DESC" IS USED
* TO ACCOMPLISH THIS, WITH THE STATIC TIMESTAMP BREAKING ANY TIES.

5220C-OPEN-40V-CSR.
MOVE VEH-ORD-ID-C
TO VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
MOVE VEH-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
TO VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE LIT-40V
TO VST-STA-STATUS-C
MOVE LIT-D
TO VST-STAT-TYP-C
MOVE LIT-Y
TO VST-ACTIVE-F
MOVE LIT-WD
TO VST-CUR-DATA-SRC-C
EXEC SQL
OPEN MEXW003_40V_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "OPEN"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5220C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* FETCHES A ROW FROM MEXW003_40V_CSR WHICH WILL RETRIEVE THE
* MOST RECENT FTC QAD (WD) WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER CODE.

5230C-FETCH-40V-ROW.
EXEC SQL
FETCH  MEXW003_40V_CSR
INTO   :VST-GBL-LOC-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW003
SET MEXW003-40V-CSR-ROW-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW003-40V-CSR-ROW-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "FETCH"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5230C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* CLOSES THE MEXW003_40V_CSR WHICH WAS USED TO RETRIEVE THE
* MOST RECENT FTC QAD (WD) WHOLESALE GLOBAL DEALER CODE.

5240C-CLOSE-40V-CSR.
EXEC SQL
CLOSE MEXW003_40V_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "CLOSE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5240C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

* A CURSOR WILL BE CREATED USING TABLE MEXW031.  ALL NON 'NA' AND

* OBTAINED FROM TABLE MEXW001_VEH_ORDER.

5300C-OPEN-MEXW031-CSR.

TO CTM-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
MOVE VEH-CATALOG-C
TO CTM-LCL-CATALOG-C

OPEN MEXW031_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE

TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE

TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-CATMAP
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5300C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* FETCHES A ROW FROM MEXW031_CSR WHICH WILL RETRIEVE OPTION CODE
* AND PRODUCT TYPE WHICH WILL BE COMBINED AND THEN USED TO POP-
* ULATE THE WERS BODY STYLE CODE FOR NON 'NA' AND NON 'EA' DATA

5320C-FETCH-MEXW031-CSR.

INTO   :CTM-OPT-OPTION-C
,:CTM-VPT-PROD-TYP-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
ADD +1
TO WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW031
SET MEXW031-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET MEXW031-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "FETCH"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-CATMAP
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5320C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* CLOSES CURSOR MEXW031_CSE WHICH RETRIEVED THE OPTION CODE AND

5340C-CLOSE-MEXW031-CSR.
EXEC SQL
CLOSE MEXW031_CSR
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "CLOSE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-CATMAP
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "5340C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

VINCENT-PCB
WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD

MOVE "TTL ROWS READ FROM MEXW032 :"

* OBTAINS THE CURRENT DEARBORN TIMESTAMP, PART OF WHICH WILL BE
* USED IN THE MAIN DRIVING CURSOR AND THE E & G HEADER/TRAILER
* ALONG WITH THE VINCENT HEADER.

7000C-OBTAIN-DRBN-TIMESTAMP.
EXEC SQL
SET  :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP  = CURRENT TIMESTAMP
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7000C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* UPDATE THE TIMESTAMP ON THE MEXS016 TABLE WITH THE TIME THAT
* THE JOB STARTED.  THIS VALUE WILL BE READ IN THE NEXT TIME THIS
* PROGRAM IS EXECUTED.

7250C-UPDATE-TIMESTAMP.
MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
TO GNT-TABLE-ID
MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-TIMESTAMP
TO GNT-KEY-DATA
EXEC SQL
UPDATE MEXS016_GENERIC2
SET    GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA = :WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD      = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
AND    GNT_TABLE_ID       = :GNT-TABLE-ID
AND    GNT_KEY_DATA       = :GNT-KEY-DATA
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "UPDATE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7250C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* SELECT THE PREVIOUS RUN'S OUTPUT FILE BATCH NUMBER.

7300C-GET-BATCH-NBR.
MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
TO GNT-TABLE-ID
MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-BATCHCTL
TO GNT-KEY-DATA
EXEC SQL
SELECT GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA
INTO  :GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
FROM   MEXS016_GENERIC2
WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
AND    GNT_TABLE_ID  = :GNT-TABLE-ID
AND    GNT_KEY_DATA  = :GNT-KEY-DATA
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE
TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
SET BATCHCTL-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-INVALID-DATE
SET BATCHCTL-NOT-FOUND
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7300C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
* UPDATE THE OUTPUT FILE'S BATCH NUMBER BY +1.

7350C-UPDATE-BATCH-NBR.
MOVE LIT-SYSTEM-ID
TO GNT-SYSTEM-CD
MOVE LIT-TABLE-ID
TO GNT-TABLE-ID
MOVE LIT-KEY-DATA-BATCHCTL
TO GNT-KEY-DATA
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
TO GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
EXEC SQL
UPDATE MEXS016_GENERIC2
SET    GNT_ATTRIBUTE_DATA = :GNT-ATTRIBUTE-DATA
WHERE  GNT_SYSTEM_CD      = :GNT-SYSTEM-CD
AND    GNT_TABLE_ID       = :GNT-TABLE-ID
AND    GNT_KEY_DATA       = :GNT-KEY-DATA
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
CONTINUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SQLCODE
TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "UPDATE"
TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-GENERIC
TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7350C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

7400C-POPULATE-HUB-HEADER.
MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
TO HUB-HDR-LAYOUT-ID
MOVE WS-ENTITY-CD
TO HUB-HDR-ENTITY-CODE
MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
TO HUB-HDR-LAYOUT-ID
MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
TO HUB-HDR-TIMESTAMP
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
TO HUB-HDR-BATCH-NBR
MOVE WS-PROCESS-ID
TO HUB-HDR-PROCESS-ID
MOVE ZERO
TO HUB-HDR-TOTAL-REC-CNT

TO HUB-HDR-PRIMARY-CONTACT
HUB-HDR-SECOND-CONTACT

TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
.

7450C-POPULATE-HUB-TRAILER.
MOVE WS-ENTITY-CD
TO HUB-TRL-ENTITY-CODE
MOVE WS-LAYOUT-ID
TO HUB-TRL-LAYOUT-ID
MOVE WS-CURR-DRBN-TIMESTAMP
TO HUB-TRL-TIMESTAMP
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
TO HUB-TRL-BATCH-NBR
MOVE WS-PROCESS-ID
TO HUB-TRL-PROCESS-ID
MOVE WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
TO HUB-TRL-TOTAL-REC-CNT
MOVE SPACES
TO HUB-TRL-PRIMARY-CONTACT
HUB-TRL-SECOND-CONTACT
MOVE HUB-TRAILER
TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
.
* POPULATES THE VINCENT HEADER IN THE OUTPUT FILE.

7500C-POPULATE-VINCENT-HEADER.
INITIALIZE VNT-HDR-HUB-REC-ID-NBR
MOVE 1
TO VNT-HDR-HUB-LINE-NBR
VNT-HDR-REC-ID-NBR
WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
STRING
WS-DRBN-YEAR
WS-DRBN-MONTH
WS-DRBN-DAY
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO
VNT-HDR-CURR-DATE
END-STRING
STRING
WS-DRBN-HOUR
WS-DRBN-MINUTE
WS-DRBN-SECOND
DELIMITED BY SIZE
INTO
VNT-HDR-CURR-TIME
END-STRING
MOVE LIT-WDMSALEM
TO VNT-HDR-REC-TYPE
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
TO VNT-HDR-CURR-BATCH-NBR
MOVE WS-PREV-BATCH-NBR
TO VNT-HDR-PREV-BATCH-NBR
MOVE LOW-VALUES
TO VNT-HDR-LOW-VALUES
MOVE VINCENT-HEADER
TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
.
* POPULATES THE VINCENT TRAILER IN THE OUTPUT FILE.

7550C-POPULATE-VINCENT-TRAILER.
INITIALIZE VNT-TRL-HUB-REC-ID-NBR
ADD  1
TO WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
MOVE WS-COUNT-LINE-NBR
TO VNT-TRL-HUB-LINE-NBR
VNT-TRL-REC-ID-NBR
MOVE LIT-999
TO VNT-TRL-HUB-REC-TYPE
MOVE LIT-WDMSALEM
TO VNT-TRL-REC-TYPE
MOVE WS-CURRENT-BATCH-NBR
TO VNT-TRL-CURR-BATCH-NBR
MOVE WS-COUNT-DTL-NBR
TO VNT-TRL-COUNTER
MOVE VINCENT-TRAILER
TO WS-VINCENT-OUTPUT-RECORD
.
* SELECTS WERS STRING FROM MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING DB2 TABLE

7600C-SELECT-WERS-DATA-W004.
EXEC SQL
SELECT  VWR_WERS_STRING_X
,VWR_WERS_VL_C
,VWR_WERS_PRD_TP_C
,VWR_MAJ_FEAT_DFNED_F
INTO :VWR-WERS-STRING-X
,:VWR-WERS-VL-C
,:VWR-WERS-PRD-TP-C
,:VWR-MAJ-FEAT-DFNED-F
FROM  MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING
WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C     =  :VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C   =  :VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE                     TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
IF VWR-WERS-STRING-X-TEXT    > SPACES    AND
VWR-MAJ-FEAT-DFNED-F      = LIT-Y
SET WERS-STRING-FOUND-SW     TO TRUE
ADD +1                       TO
WS-NBR-ROWS-READ-MEXW004
END-IF
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET WERS-STRING-NOT-FOUND-SW
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
PERFORM 7620C-WRITE-MEXW004-AUDIT-RPT
MOVE SC-DB2-SQLCODE     TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"           TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-MEXW004    TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG      TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7600C"            TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE
.
/*****************************************************************
* WRITE AUDIT REPORT FOR MEXW004_VEH_WERS_STRING TABLE           *

7620C-WRITE-MEXW004-AUDIT-RPT.
MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE " VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C: "      TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VWR-VEH-ORD-ID-C           TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE " VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C: "    TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VWR-DTA-DATA-SRC-C         TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES                     TO AUDIT-RECORD
.
* SELECT CURRENT STATUS FROM MEXW003_VEH_STATUS                  *

7700C-SELECT-CURR-STAT-W003.
EXEC SQL
SELECT  STA_STATUS_C
,  VST_STAT_Y
INTO :VST-STA-STATUS-C
, :VST-STAT-Y
FROM  MEXW003_VEH_STATUS
WHERE  VEH_ORD_ID_C     =  :VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
AND  DTA_DATA_SRC_C   =  :VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
AND  VST_CUR_STAT_F   =  :LIT-Y
AND  VST_ACTIVE_F     =  :LIT-Y
END-EXEC
MOVE SQLCODE                     TO SC-DB2-SQLCODE
EVALUATE TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-OK
SET CURR-STAT-FOUND-SW  TO TRUE
WHEN SC-DB2-SQLCODE-NOT-FOUND
SET CURR-STAT-NOT-FOUND-SW
TO TRUE
WHEN OTHER
MOVE SC-DB2-SQLCODE     TO DB2-ABEND-SQLCODE
MOVE "SELECT"           TO DB2-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE LIT-TBL-VEH-STATUS TO DB2-ABEND-TABLE
MOVE DB2-ABEND-MSG      TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "7700C"            TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
STRING "ABEND: 7700C-SELECT-CURR-STAT-W003 "
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
STRING "VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C  : ", VST-VEH-ORD-ID-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
STRING "VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C: ", VST-DTA-DATA-SRC-C
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
STRING "VST-CURR-STAT-F   : ", LIT-Y
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
STRING "VST-ACTIVE-F      : ", LIT-Y
DELIMITED BY SIZE     INTO AUDIT-RECORD
END-STRING
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE SPACES             TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

8000C-GET-SYSPARM-RECORD.

SYSPARM-PCB
SYSPARM-RECORD

TO SC-IMS-STAT
EVALUATE TRUE

WHEN SC-IMS-STAT-END-OF-DB

TO TRUE

TO IMS-ABEND-STATUS

TO IMS-ABEND-FUNCTION
MOVE SYSPARM-PCB-NAME
TO IMS-ABEND-PCB-NAME
MOVE IMS-ABEND-MSG
TO ABEND-MSG
MOVE "8000C"
TO ABEND-PARAGRAPH
PERFORM 9999I-ABEND
END-EVALUATE

* CONDITION, THE INFORMATION WILL BE WRITTEN OUT TO THE AUDIT
* REPORT AND RETURN-CODE WILL BE SET TO 3, SO THAT AN EMAIL
* MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE GEVIS HELPDESK TO INFORM THEM TO
* LOOK AT THE AUDIT REPORT.

9000C-MISSING-MEXW035-ROW.
MOVE SPACES
TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "MISSING DEALER ON MEXW035:  "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "DEALER CODE:         "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE DLR-DLR-DLR-C
TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C
TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
ADD 1
TO WS-NBR-MEXW035-NOTFOUND-CALLS
.
* IF A CALL TO TABLE MEXW027 RESULTED IN A SQL +100 (NOT FOUND)
* CONDITION, THE INFORMATION WILL BE WRITTEN OUT TO THE AUDIT
* REPORT AND RETURN-CODE WILL BE SET TO 3, SO THAT AN EMAIL
* MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE GEVIS HELPDESK TO INFORM THEM TO
* LOOK AT THE AUDIT REPORT.

9100C-MISSING-MEXW027-ROW.
MOVE SPACES
TO AUDIT-RECORD
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "MISSING STATUS ON MEXW027:  "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE PL-SPACE
TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "STATUS CODE:         "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE CNT-GBL-DATA-X
TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
MOVE "ASSOCIATED VIN:      "
TO AUDIT-LABEL
MOVE VEH-VIN-FULL-C
TO AUDIT-DATA
WRITE AUDIT-RECORD
SET SEND-EMAIL
TO TRUE
ADD 1
TO WS-NBR-MEXW027-NOTFOUND-CALLS
.
* CALLS COREDUMP TO FORCE AN ABEND CAUSED BY AN ERROR.

9999C-CALL-COREDUMP.
CALL "COREDUMP"
.
COPY CPESEBCR.
*BMPSHELL CALLED ROUTINES
